name: Strata: A Game About Speed (2D Speedrun Platformer)
name_original: Strata: A Game About Speed (2D Speedrun Platformer)
description:
Mighty is the hand...

This deceptively simple platformer showcases a deep set of movement mechanics that, once mastered, will allow you to fly through the level at impossible speeds.

Strata takes the high-skill speedrunning mechanics of games like Ghostrunner and Celeste and uses them as the entire foundation for a game. Your Dash, Slide and Jump can be cancelled into each other.

The first person to submit a screenshot showing they've beaten my time gets a cameo in the game. This will probably take the form of your name being present on the single-player leader-board.
